metadata.name: Body and Soul of Popular Culture
metadata.description:
[The "Miolo do Boi]

The Miolo do Boi is the player in the Bumba Meu Boi groups who stays hidden under the ox's hide, dancing and interacting with the characters of the folkloric celebration.
Researcher Maria Silveira highlights the importance of celebrating this brincante.

"The core is the soul of the ox, so because it is the soul of the ox, the movements that it develops at the center of the manifestation of the Bumba Meu Boi represent the vitality of the ox," she said
